all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And whoso is found a faithful, a just, and a wise steward shall enter into the joy of his Lord, and shall inherit eternal life.
Doctrine and Covenants 51:19
Quote of the Day
"We all need to be lifted up by the Lord with peace, with comfort, and most of all with personal revelation."
Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
